-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A framework for code and document generation for scientific software - System SubPackage
--   
--   Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/JacquesCarette/Drasil#readme</a>
@package drasil-system
@version 0.1.1.0

module System.Drasil

-- | Data structure for holding all of the requisite information about a
--   system to be used in artifact generation.
data System
[SI] :: (CommonIdea a, Idea a, Quantity e, Eq e, MayHaveUnit e, Quantity h, MayHaveUnit h, Quantity i, MayHaveUnit i, HasUID j, Constrained j) => a -> SystemKind -> People -> Purpose -> Background -> Scope -> Motivation -> [e] -> [InstanceModel] -> [DataDefinition] -> [String] -> [h] -> [i] -> [j] -> [ConstQDef] -> ChunkDB -> System
data SystemKind
Specification :: SystemKind
RunnableSoftware :: SystemKind
Notebook :: SystemKind
Website :: SystemKind
class HasSystem c_a8Rs
system :: HasSystem c_a8Rs => Lens' c_a8Rs System
authors :: HasSystem c_a8Rs => Lens' c_a8Rs People
background :: HasSystem c_a8Rs => Lens' c_a8Rs Background
configFiles :: HasSystem c_a8Rs => Lens' c_a8Rs [String]
constants :: HasSystem c_a8Rs => Lens' c_a8Rs [ConstQDef]
datadefs :: HasSystem c_a8Rs => Lens' c_a8Rs [DataDefinition]
instModels :: HasSystem c_a8Rs => Lens' c_a8Rs [InstanceModel]
kind :: HasSystem c_a8Rs => Lens' c_a8Rs SystemKind
motivation :: HasSystem c_a8Rs => Lens' c_a8Rs Motivation
purpose :: HasSystem c_a8Rs => Lens' c_a8Rs Purpose
scope :: HasSystem c_a8Rs => Lens' c_a8Rs Scope
systemdb :: HasSystem c_a8Rs => Lens' c_a8Rs ChunkDB
whatsTheBigIdea :: System -> IdeaDict

-- | Project Example purpose.
type Purpose = [Sentence]

-- | Project Example background information, used in the <tt>What</tt>
--   section of README.
type Background = [Sentence]

-- | Project Example scope.
type Scope = [Sentence]

-- | Project Example motivation.
type Motivation = [Sentence]
